# blastshield_endpoints (Data Source)

Lists Blastshield endpoints with optional filters.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `address` (List of String) Filter by address.
- `api_access` (Boolean) Filter by api_access.
- `default_gw` (Boolean) Filter by default_gw.
- `dns_name` (List of String) Filter by dns_name.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Filter by enabled.
- `endpoint` (List of String) Filter by endpoint.
- `group` (List of Number) Filter by group.
- `id` (List of Number) Filter by id.
- `name` (List of String) Filter by name.
- `node_id` (List of String) Filter by node_id.
- `tags` (List of String) Filter by tags.

### Read-Only

- `endpoints` (Attributes List) List of endpoints matching the filters. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--endpoints))

<a id="nestedatt--endpoints"></a>
### Nested Schema for `endpoints`

Read-Only:

- `address` (String)
- `api_access` (Boolean)
- `default_gw` (Boolean)
- `dns_name` (Set of String)
- `enabled` (Boolean)
- `endpoint` (String)
- `groups` (Attributes List) Groups this resource belongs to. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--endpoints--groups))
- `id` (Number)
- `name` (String)
- `node_id` (String)
- `tags` (Map of String)

<a id="nestedatt--endpoints--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `endpoints.groups`

Read-Only:

- `expires` (Number) Unix timestamp when group membership expires.
- `id` (Number) The group ID.
